hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash #source=/android/exodus-merger source=/android/exodus cd $source
echo ${source} repos=("frameworks_base" "vendor_vanir" "system_core" "device_oneplus_bacon" "bionic" "libcore" "external_tinycompress" "frameworks_av" "device_oppo_msm8974-common" "frameworks_native" "art" "external_skia") for i in "${repos[@]}" do echo "pushing ${i}" gerritexodus ${source} $i EXODUS done
